EmailTemplate.name: CRADA Requires Signature Partner
EmailTemplate.subject: CRADA Requires Signature Partner
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Please find attached the latest revision of the proposed CRADA for the project entitled {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Title__c}, {!Agreement__c.Name}. This draft is being presented for signature by an authorized official on behalf of {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Partner__c}. Please also complete the certifications in Appendix A. Please sign and return a copy by email. Should you have any questions or additional changes, please contact {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Officer__c}.
Thank you.
